sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHEDULE, a ſcroll of paper or parchment, annexed to a will, leafe, or other deed; containing an inventory of goods, or ſome other matter omitted in the body of the deed. —The word is a diminutive of the Latin ſcheda, or Greek σχεδη, a leaf or piece of paper.
